content.full_text: Certificate of Survey for Alvin Ringo, 17 November 1
paragraphs: Certificate of Survey for Alvin Ringo, 17 November 1

footnotes.text:
1Lincoln apparently performed two surveys for Alvin  Ringo, and the certificates were
                  likely originally written on the same piece of paper and separated later. The first
                  survey only survives in the form of twohandwrittentranscriptions. The second survey is transcribed here.  Page one was written entirely by Abraham
                  Lincoln, including Nealeâ€™s signature.
2The land described here is located nearClary Creekin present-dayMenard County, southwest ofPetersburg.
